author: Analysis by Nathan Hodge and Tara John, CNN
title: Annexations, a rump state or puppet rulers. Here's what Putin may be planning for Ukraine
description: Putin has been very clear about his basic goals in invading: He wants to disarm Ukraine, sever its ties to the NATO military alliance and end the Ukrainian people's aspirations of joining the West. Guessing exactly how he plans to execute that plan is a diffeâ€¦
